DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Number of Days Since Last Cigarette Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the number of days since they last smoked a cigarette.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Number of Days Since Last Cigarette
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about the number of days since an individual last smoked a cigarette.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
